speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: SCENE V. Florence. Without the walls. A tucket afar off.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Enter an old Widow of Florence, DIANA, VIOLENTA, and MARIANA, with other Citizens

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Nay, come; for if they do approach the city, we

speaker: Widow
text_entry: shall lose all the sight.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: They say the French count has done most honourable service.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: It is reported that he has taken their greatest

speaker: Widow
text_entry: commander; and that with his own hand he slew the

speaker: Widow
text_entry: duke's brother.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Tucket

speaker: Widow
text_entry: We have lost our labour; they are gone a contrary

speaker: Widow
text_entry: way: hark! you may know by their trumpets.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Come, let's return again, and suffice ourselves with

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: the report of it. Well, Diana, take heed of this

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: French earl: the honour of a maid is her name; and

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: no legacy is so rich as honesty.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: I have told my neighbour how you have been solicited

speaker: Widow
text_entry: by a gentleman his companion.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: I know that knave; hang him! one Parolles: a

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: filthy officer he is in those suggestions for the

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: young earl. Beware of them, Diana; their promises,

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: enticements, oaths, tokens, and all these engines of

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: lust, are not the things they go under: many a maid

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: hath been seduced by them; and the misery is,

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: example, that so terrible shows in the wreck of

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: maidenhood, cannot for all that dissuade succession,

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: but that they are limed with the twigs that threaten

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: them. I hope I need not to advise you further; but

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: I hope your own grace will keep you where you are,

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: though there were no further danger known but the

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: modesty which is so lost.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: You shall not need to fear me.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: I hope so.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Enter HELENA, disguised like a Pilgrim

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Look, here comes a pilgrim: I know she will lie at

speaker: Widow
text_entry: my house; thither they send one another: I'll

speaker: Widow
text_entry: question her. God save you, pilgrim! whither are you bound?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To Saint Jaques le Grand.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Where do the palmers lodge, I do beseech you?

speaker: Widow
text_entry: At the Saint Francis here beside the port.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Is this the way?

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Ay, marry, is't.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: A march afar

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Hark you! they come this way.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: If you will tarry, holy pilgrim,

speaker: Widow
text_entry: But till the troops come by,

speaker: Widow
text_entry: I will conduct you where you shall be lodged;

speaker: Widow
text_entry: The rather, for I think I know your hostess

speaker: Widow
text_entry: As ample as myself.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Is it yourself?

speaker: Widow
text_entry: If you shall please so, pilgrim.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I thank you, and will stay upon your leisure.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: You came, I think, from France?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I did so.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Here you shall see a countryman of yours

speaker: Widow
text_entry: That has done worthy service.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: His name, I pray you.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: The Count Rousillon: know you such a one?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: But by the ear, that hears most nobly of him:

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: His face I know not.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Whatsome'er he is,

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: He's bravely taken here. He stole from France,

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: As 'tis reported, for the king had married him

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Against his liking: think you it is so?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Ay, surely, mere the truth: I know his lady.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: There is a gentleman that serves the count

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Reports but coarsely of her.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: What's his name?

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Monsieur Parolles.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: O, I believe with him,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: In argument of praise, or to the worth

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Of the great count himself, she is too mean

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To have her name repeated: all her deserving

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Is a reserved honesty, and that

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I have not heard examined.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Alas, poor lady!

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: 'Tis a hard bondage to become the wife

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: Of a detesting lord.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: I warrant, good creature, wheresoe'er she is,

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Her heart weighs sadly: this young maid might do her

speaker: Widow
text_entry: A shrewd turn, if she pleased.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: How do you mean?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: May be the amorous count solicits her

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: In the unlawful purpose.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: He does indeed;

speaker: Widow
text_entry: And brokes with all that can in such a suit

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Corrupt the tender honour of a maid:

speaker: Widow
text_entry: But she is arm'd for him and keeps her guard

speaker: Widow
text_entry: In honestest defence.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: The gods forbid else!

speaker: Widow
text_entry: So, now they come:

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Drum and Colours

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Enter BERTRAM, PAROLLES, and the whole army

speaker: Widow
text_entry: That is Antonio, the duke's eldest son;

speaker: Widow
text_entry: That, Escalus.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Which is the Frenchman?

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: He;

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: That with the plume: 'tis a most gallant fellow.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: I would he loved his wife: if he were honester

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: He were much goodlier: is't not a handsome gentleman?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I like him well.

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: 'Tis pity he is not honest: yond's that same knave

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: That leads him to these places: were I his lady,

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: I would Poison that vile rascal.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Which is he?

speaker: DIANA
text_entry: That jack-an-apes with scarfs: why is he melancholy?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Perchance he's hurt i' the battle.

speaker: PAROLLES
text_entry: Lose our drum! well.

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: He's shrewdly vexed at something: look, he has spied us.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Marry, hang you!

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: And your courtesy, for a ring-carrier!

speaker: MARIANA
text_entry: Exeunt BERTRAM, PAROLLES, and army

speaker: Widow
text_entry: The troop is past. Come, pilgrim, I will bring you

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Where you shall host: of enjoin'd penitents

speaker: Widow
text_entry: There's four or five, to great Saint Jaques bound,

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Already at my house.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I humbly thank you:

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Please it this matron and this gentle maid

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To eat with us to-night, the charge and thanking

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Shall be for me; and, to requite you further,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I will bestow some precepts of this virgin

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Worthy the note.

speaker: BOTH
text_entry: We'll take your offer kindly.

speaker: BOTH
text_entry: Exeunt
